feed.title: Docker Controller Bot Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Docker Controller Bot: v3.2.0
entry.content:
[FIX] Now when upgrading, it will respect the IP address set in the container. [FIX] Now when upgrading, it will respect the runtime set in the container. [FIX] Small grammatical errors in Spanish. [FIX] Full compatibility with DockerHub repository (changetag) [NEW] Compatibility with GitHub repository (changetag) [NEW] German language [NEW] Fallback language locale, If the translation is not declared for selected language it will display English one

Full Changelog: https://github.com/dgongut/docker-controller-bot/compare/v3.1.0...v3.2.0

entry.title: New release for Docker Controller Bot: v3.2.1
entry.content:
[FIX] Improve error messages when getting tags

Full Changelog: https://github.com/dgongut/docker-controller-bot/compare/v3.2.0...v3.2.1

entry.title: New release for Docker Controller Bot: v3.2.2
entry.content:
[NEW] Russian language [FIX] Now mute functionality survives after restarting Updated libraries

What's Changed

  • add RU locale by @leyalton in https://github.com/dgongut/docker-controller-bot/pull/48

New Contributors

  • @leyalton made their first contribution in https://github.com/dgongut/docker-controller-bot/pull/48

Full Changelog: https://github.com/dgongut/docker-controller-bot/compare/v3.2.1...v3.2.2

entry.title: New release for Docker Controller Bot: v3.2.3
entry.content:
[FIX] User is now retained when updating Updated libraries

Full Changelog: https://github.com/dgongut/docker-controller-bot/compare/v3.2.2...v3.2.3

entry.title: New release for Docker Controller Bot: v3.3.0
